Class GraphSites.Root

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.comp.GraphSites.Root
  • Enclosing class:
    GraphSites

    static class GraphSites.Root
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for details of root nodes.

      • Root

        Root(int x,
     int y,
     int type,
     int dir,
     int[] offsets)
        Creates a Root object for GraphSites with a root layout.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        type - the edge type
        dir - the direction code of the root
        offsets - the list of offsets for line roots, null otherwise
